title: Micro-disconnects all game lately.
body:
This never used to happen. Nothing has changed with my internet.
My Champion will randomly stand still for 3-6 seconds, the minions will continue hitting each other but not doing damage, and enemy and allied champions will slowly float around, until all of a sudden, i'll unfreeze and all the animations will catch up at the same time, and if it happens during a teamfight/splitpush/any time after 35 mins I'm usually dead by then. I've lost a fair few games due to this and I don't want to play anymore until I get it solved.

This happens at least 10 times a game, other than that I have amazing ping, sitting around 15-30. I've got no problems with my internet besides this. So far I've tried restarting my PC and Power cycling my router, putting my computer in the DMZ, and tried playing at different hours of the day. any help at all would be greatly appreciated.

Also, I'm with TPG unlimited, if it matters.

Thanks!

same thing happening here as well, i have Telstra ADSL 2+.. normally my ping is around 29 maybe 40 on a bad day.
but these disconnects are consistant.
